name: Capitals World
description:
With Capitals World you can easily learn the capitals of the countries of the world by playing.

A game that shows you the capitals and flags of the 243 countries of the world. Play, have fun and learn the easy way.

The capitals of different countries will appear from the top, you must click on the correct one to earn points.

5 levels of difficulty:

The "Easy" level, recommended to start learning the capitals of the world.

"Challenge" level, expert level, the most difficult yet.

The game has 243 capitals of countries in the world, with their corresponding flags.

5 levels of difficulty in the number of possible questions.

4 levels of difficulty when selecting the capitals.

3 ways to play; Country / Flag, Country or Flag.

3 types of help.

2 game modes; for time or 3 lives.

1 possible extra life per game.

Possibility of saving your new record.

Scoreboard with high scores.

Capitals World includes the ability to select 3 languages to play; English, Spanish and French.
